Description: "Lobby ID" is a unique code (a string of numbers) generated for every lobby. Hosts can copy their lobby ID and send it to other players to invite them to their lobby even if they aren't friends on Steam.

French.Translation: COPIER L'ID DE SALON DANS LE PRESSE-PAPIERS

Spanish.Translation: COPIAR ID. DE SALA AL PORTAPAPELES

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: COPIAR ID DE LOBBY PARA ÁREA DE TRANSFERÊNCIA

Japanese.Translation: ロビーIDをクリップボードにコピー

name: MainMenu.Settings.CopyLobbyIdButton
